Tilhenger 2.0 -- Male Rock Dwarf Ranger: 11

Background: Scout Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Torag (LG) Player: Jim
Experience: 10500/11000 Level: 11 Speed: 20 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 8/13
Ability Notes:

Wild Stride: Moves normally over non-magical difficult terrain and treats non-magical greater difficult terrain as difficult terrain

Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 5 from any)
Vigilant Senses: Perception Master
Assurance (Folktale Lore): Can take an automatic 23 on Folktale Lore checks
Assurance (Religion): Can take an automatic 23 on Religion checks
Assurance (Survival): Can take an automatic 25 on Survival checks
Experienced Tracker: Can Track at full Speed, suffering a -5 Survival penalty
Forager: Failures and critical failures on Survival to Subsist are successes/Subsist successes provide for self and 8 others, or twice that number with a critical success
Hunt Prey: (1) Gives +2 Perception to Seek and +2 Survival to Track a designated creature until next daily prep
Stonecunning: +2 Perception to detect unusual stonework, and automatically attempts a -2 check to notice it
Terrain Expertise (Underground): +1 Survival in Underground
Trackless Step: Has continuous benefits of the Cover Tracks action while moving at full Speed in natural terrain
Combat
Hit Points: 175 Armor Class: 29 (dexterity (4 max); expert) Class DC: Ranger: 28 (dexterity; expert)
Armor: Leather Shield: None Weapons: Clan Dagger (+18 1d4+3 P/B; strength; expert); Composite Shortbow (+18 1d6+1 P [Crit +d10] R120'; dexterity; expert); Dwarven Waraxe (+18 1d8+3 S [2h d12]; strength; expert); Warhammer (+18 1d8+3 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +33
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Dwarven Weapon Familiarity: Attack Trained (Battle Axe; Pick; Warhammer)/Weapon Familiarity (Dwarf Weapons)
Far Shot: Doubles ranged weapon increments
Medium Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Mountain's Stoutness: +11 Hit Points
Ranger Expertise: Class Expert (Ranger)
Ranger Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Toughness: +11 Hit Points
Deadly Aim: (1) Ranged Strike with a -2 penalty vs. hunted prey inflicts +6 HP
Double Shot: (2) Makes 2 ranged Strikes against different foes at the current multiple attack penalty -2
Dwarven Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon dwarf weapons
Favored Enemy: Can use Hunt Prey with a chosen creature type as a free action during initiative
Hunt Prey: (1) Suffers no distance penalty for ranged Strikes in the 2nd range increment vs. a designated creature until next daily prep
Nature's Edge: Foes suffer flat-footed vs. self from natural uneven ground or natural or snare-related difficult terrain
Precision: First hit on hunted prey each rd inflicts +2d8 HP precision
Ranger Weapon Expertise: Critical hits with a simple weapon, martial weapon, or unarmed attack vs. hunted prey inflict its critical specialization effect
Rock Dwarf: +2 DC vs. Shove, Trip, and magical knock prone, and reduces any forced move distance of 10' or more by half
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +20 (constitution; master); Reflex: +20 (dexterity; master); Will: +19 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Evasion: Save Master (Reflex)
Iron Will: Save Expert (Will)
Juggernaut: Save Master (Fortitude)
Evasion: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Fast Recovery: Regains 2x HP and drained severity from rest/Successful Fortitude vs. an ongoing disease or poison reduces its stage by 2, or 1 if virulent; critical success by 3, or 2 if virulent
Juggernaut: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Mountain's Stoutness: -4 dying recovery DC
Toughness: -1 DC on recovery checks
Magic
Spell Slots: O1: 1; O2: 1; O3: 1; OC1: 2 Attack: Occult: +15 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Occult: 25 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Daze (O0 Enc): 1
Faerie Fire (O2 Evo): (2) R120' 10' burst makes concealed creatures visible and invisible creatures concealed for 5 min
Fear (O1 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts frightened 2 (save Will inflicts frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 3 and fleeing for 1 rd) (heightened 3rd affects 5 targets)
Message (O0 Ill): 1
Wanderer's Guide (O3 Div): (1 min) Reveals a route to a specified destination and reduces the movement penalty from difficult terrain while following it by half until next daily prep
Magic Notes:
Bard Dedication: Spell Trained (Occult)/Knows 2 occult cantrips
Basic Bard Spellcasting: Has 1 1st-level, 1 2nd-level, and 1 3rd-level occult spell slot
Occult Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
